testsuite.name: com.paysecure.banks.allbanks

testcase.name: verifyAddbank
testcase.system-out: Verify that Add ban is enable User Click on the Add Bank button Verify user is on the Bank details Page

testcase.name: clearTheSearchFieldAndCheckIt
testcase.system-out: Verify search text fiels is enable and ready to recive input from user User Enter Bank name on the Search Bank name field :- SA3434434 User click on search button

testcase.name: afterSearchingRefreshThePage
testcase.system-out: Verify search text fiels is enable and ready to recive input from user User Enter Bank name on the Search Bank name field :- CA User click on search button

testcase.name: validateShowAllButtonIsAlreadySelected
testcase.system-out: Expected headers: [BANK NAME, ACTION] Actual headers found: [BANK NAME, ACTION] Expected header count: 2 Actual header count: 2 Table header verification PASSED. Headers match exactly by name. User click on the Show All button

testcase.name: checkActiveStatusActiveAllBanks
testcase.system-out: Expected headers: [BANK NAME, ACTION] Actual headers found: [BANK NAME, ACTION] Expected header count: 2 Actual header count: 2 Table header verification PASSED. Headers match exactly by name. ✅ All banks on all pages have 'Active' status

testcase.name: checkInactiveStatusInactiveInAllBanks
testcase.system-out: Expected headers: [BANK NAME, ACTION] Actual headers found: [BANK NAME, ACTION] Expected header count: 2 Actual header count: 2 Table header verification PASSED. Headers match exactly by name. ✅ All banks on the current page have 'Inactive' status

testcase.name: verifyTableHeaderInAllbanks
testcase.system-out: Expected headers: [BANK NAME, ACTION] Actual headers found: [BANK NAME, ACTION] Expected header count: 2 Actual header count: 2 Table header verification PASSED. Headers match exactly by name.

testcase.name: validateForActiveAndInactiveBank
testcase.system-out: User click on the Show All button User clicked on the Active button User clicked on the Inactive button
